concept.title: Cosmic Grid Guardians
concept.description: A celestial reimagining of Tic-Tac-Toe where players defend their star systems by strategically placing cosmic markers to outwit alien invaders and achieve galactic dominance.
concept.theme: Retro-futuristic space opera with vibrant cosmic nebulae and glowing celestial bodies.
concept.objective: To win a set number of Tic-Tac-Toe rounds against increasingly challenging alien AI opponents, thereby protecting your designated star system.
mechanics: Turn-based strategic placement of 'X' (your Guardian) or 'O' (the Invader) markers on a 3x3 cosmic grid.
Identifying winning lines (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) on the grid.
Adapting to the opponent's strategy and anticipating their moves.
player_abilities: Place Guardian Marker: Standard move to place your symbol on an empty grid space.
Scramble Grid (Limited Use): Re-randomizes the current state of the grid, offering a fresh start (usable once per game or with a cooldown).
Predictive Insight (Passive): A subtle visual cue highlights a potential winning move for the opponent, allowing for defensive counter-play.

enemies.name: The Nebula Nuisance
enemies.behavior: Randomly places markers, making straightforward but unpredictable moves.

enemies.name: The Quasar Queller
enemies.behavior: Attempts to block player's winning lines and sets up its own basic wins.

enemies.name: The Supernova Strategist
enemies.behavior: Highly tactical, actively seeks to create multiple winning opportunities and anticipate player's block attempts.

powerups.name: Stellar Shift
powerups.effect: Allows you to swap the positions of two of your already placed markers on the grid.

powerups.name: Cosmic Rewind
powerups.effect: Lets you undo your last move, providing a chance to reconsider your placement.

concept.level_progression: Players progress through different star systems, each guarded by a unique set of alien opponents with increasing AI difficulty. Winning a set number of rounds within a system unlocks the next.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for each win against an alien opponent. Bonus points are awarded for achieving a win with minimal moves or by utilizing powerups effectively.
concept.visual_style: Vibrant and retro-futuristic 2D art. The game grid is presented as a celestial map with glowing lines. Markers are stylized as glowing cosmic entities (e.g., a benevolent star for 'X' and a swirling void for 'O'). Backgrounds feature parallax scrolling nebulae and distant galaxies.
concept.sound_theme: Electronic synthwave music with ambient space sounds. Each marker placement has a satisfying 'chime' or 'zap' sound. Winning a round triggers a triumphant fanfare with distinct alien defeat sounds for each enemy type.

level_design.name: First Contact
level_design.description: Your first mission as a Cosmic Grid Guardian! An unknown Invader presence has been detected. Learn the basics of grid control and neutralize the immediate threat.
